definition: Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
as quickly as possible/as soon as possible/with all speed

sentences.english: I can happily say I've been off drugs for nearly a year now.
sentences.chinese: 我可以興奮地說我此刻快一年沒有沾過福壽膏了。

sentences.english: Changshan archipelago is rich in resources, and the development of coastal economy is very fast.
sentences.chinese: 長山羣島資源豐富，海島經濟發展較快。

sentences.english: Later, those boats were heavily outrun by modern ships.
sentences.chinese: 稍後，那些船很重地根據現代船跑得更快。

sentences.english: He maketh my feet like hinds' feet: and setteth me upon my high places.
sentences.chinese: 他使我的腳快如母鹿的蹄，又使我在高處安穩。

sentences.english: You know it's gonna rain when you see big storm clouds rolling in!
sentences.chinese: 看着烏雲飄過來，就知道快下雨了。

sentences.english: But would you like express service or same-day?
sentences.chinese: 不外，您是要快洗效力照舊當日取？

sentences.english: The bonus pay for this month is almost twice that of the basic salary .
sentences.chinese: 這個月效益工資都快是基本工資的兩倍了。

sentences.english: You will see how quickly it damps.
sentences.chinese: 你們等會會看到它的減幅速度有多快。

sentences.english: He would learn more quickly if he worked harder.
sentences.chinese: 如果再用功些，他會學得更快。

sentences.english: He swims faster than any other student in his class(does).
sentences.chinese: 他比班上其他任何人都遊得快。

sentences.english: The wear-out of plane tyres is serious and should be replaced periodically.
sentences.chinese: 由於飛機輪胎磨損快，要求經常更換。

sentences.english: Try to pacify the child, he's been crying for hours.
sentences.chinese: 快哄哄孩子，他哭了好幾個鐘頭了。

sentences.english: Production goes up faster this month.
But today, fox hunting itself is on the verge of becoming an endangered species.
sentences.chinese: 但是現在，獵狐活動本身就快成爲瀕臨絕種的東西了。

sentences.english: Loosen 1st to open a hand, my wrist was quickly made by you to break.
sentences.chinese: 先鬆開手，我手腕快被你弄斷了。

sentences.english: The fish was biting so fast it was impossible to react on time.
sentences.chinese: 魚遊的如此快不可能準時反應過來。

definition: to do sth more quickly/Hurry up!/Get a move on!
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
in a flash/in the blink of an eye/to glance
